contentrichtext.text: {{coord|39|20|51|N|46|41|12|E|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name =Xocik |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Qubadli Rayon|Qubadli]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=20 |lats=51 |latNS=N |longd=46|longm=41 |longs=12 |longEW=E |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xocik''' (also, '''XoÃ§ik''' and '''Khodzhik''') is a village in the [[Qubadli Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. == References == *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150A2A3774E0440003BA962ED3}} *{{ADG|000e1e}} {{Qubadli Rayon}} [[Category:Populated places in Qubadli District]] {{Qubadli-geo-stub}}
